reviewTitle: Unleashing the Power of Portable Sound ‚Äì Zeb-Pixie Speaker
reviewDescription: I recently had the pleasure of experiencing the Zeb-Pixie Wireless Speaker from Zebronics, and I must say, it has completely exceeded my expectations! The sleek black finish not only adds an elegant touch to my desk but also fits seamlessly into any decor, whether at home or as I move about. Its lightweight design, coupled with a handy carry loop, makes it a breeze to take everywhere.What truly sets this speaker apart is the incredible sound quality it delivers. Despite its compact size, the 5W RMS output fills any room with clear, resonant sound that's rich in quality and free from distortion. Coupled with the latest Bluetooth v5.3 technology, it ensures a stable, seamless connection that consistently enriches my audio experiences, whether I'm listening to music, podcasts, or taking calls.The True Wireless Stereo (TWS) functionality is a game changer, allowing me to pair two Zeb-Pixie speakers for an immersive stereo sound that's perfect for enhancing the ambiance at gatherings or for a richer personal listening session. The battery life is impressive as well, with up to 7 hours of playback time, minimizing the need for frequent recharges and keeping the tunes flowing all day or night.The speaker's versatility extends with features like mSD card support for up to 32GB, intuitive media and volume controls, and a practical call function. These features make it not just a speaker, but a multifunctional tool for everyday use. Whether I'm streaming my favorite playlists or catching up on audiobooks, the MP3 format support ensures I have all my audio needs covered.In conclusion, the Zeb-Pixie Wireless Speaker in black is a standout product that combines great sound, portability, and thoughtful features at an incredibly affordable price. For anyone in search of a reliable, high-quality portable speaker that won‚Äôt break the bank, this is definitely a fantastic choice. Highly recommended!

reviewTitle: Good product for those who emphasis on "Branded products"
reviewDescription:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
            
        
    
    








  
  
    ¬†I am writing this review after using two kind of Karaoke Mic.If you having fond of singing, then you must have one handy karaoke BT mic.There are several types of BT karaoke mic available in the market like WS 858 type, Q7 type, Q9 type, VRJTEC design 2 etc. Mostly all are available as imported from China.I was owning Kay-joy mic which is equally similar as VRJTEC design 2, and then ordered this Zebrinics zeb fun for gifting purpose.I am writing this review comparing Zebronics Zeb fun with my Kay-Joy BT mic. (Also watch video).We can use it for karaoke singing as well as BT Speaker for entertainment.Pros:Build quality of Zeb fun is very nice, easy to handle and sing.Silicone body cover grip is given to reduce perspirations during hand held use.The speaker size looks smaller, but is louder and having more crispy clear sound than Kay-joy design mic.Speaker sound output is really better in sense of sound quality and sound depth.Good sound levels for usage up to 15X10 size rooms in calm environment.Warranty of 1 year.Cons:You are not getting FM radio and voice change feature like other BT mics.Using as karaoke singing, the microphone needs to keep very close (we can say touch to lower lips) for good result, otherwise it doesn't catch voice.Sliding switches are seems loose slides and feels like they will malfunction in future after long time usage.Product manual is not enough informative for first time users.Price is quite high.If you are buying this for small kids, who tends to accidental drop and mishandling mic like other toys, then should go for other low price variants. And those who believes in Warranties and branded items, they should buy this. Unless other type mics are easily available at lower rates than 1k price and they also serves same or more features in my opinion.

Product is not getting charged, and making continues sound till it discharged, not in use now. Please do not buy cheep product like this .Amazon asking for rate , i am not willing to give a single star , but cant proceed without.

Superb product. Have been trying cheap chinese products which do not last long and are mostly of poor quality.This is costlier but built is very sturdy. Feels good to hold it and speak or sing. Grip is good. Design is good though the speaker at bottom appears to be the mouthpiece as one would find in normal mikes.Sound quality with echo is quite rich and volume is decent.Bluetooth is quick to connect with other options of inputs like aux in, sd card etc provided.Overall very impressed with the product which i got at around 1.6k.

reviewTitle: Amazon and Zebronics need to pull up their socks.
reviewDescription: I am a regular buyer from Amazon. For the first time I am forced to give a negative view.My speaker is still on charging mode as I write this review even after 36 hours have bygone since I put it on charge and I have been unable to use it even once.The product is non-returnable and I am unable to connect through the customer care number of Zebronics that is 044-4000004. The only other option is to carry this cute thing to service center which is impossible because of my hectic lifestyle. So much for trusting Amazon and the video reviews on this product!
Not recommended if you want a decent sound quality. There is no sound below 60% volume and after that it's pretty loud but too much distorted. Overall not worth it even at this price.
Worth it

reviewTitle: Great external speaker & mic for the price
reviewDescription: Size is minuscule and provides quite a loud output for its portable dimensions. Fills a medium sized room with its loud sound and mic is great as well. I'm using it for conference calls and very happy with its performance as it lasts nearly 4 hours with 75% volume. Connectivity is stable and there is no disturbance with nearby devices. I would not recommend it for music but nothing beats it for online meetings at this price range.Sound starts to crackle at higher volume and the verbal announcements for switching on/off incld. pairing is a nuisance during daily use. I don't want to broadcast to the entire floor that I'm turning on/off my external speaker. Simple beeps would have sufficed.
Frequently bluetooth disconnect issue and work in very short range

reviewTitle: Speaker is loud enuf and gud enuf for the price.
reviewDescription: What I liked about the product: Its build quality. The materials used. The button quality. The echo and Volume button slides for different levels of output. Another review said its fixed,its not. The Speaker quality is gud enuf for the price but its less than wat I expected.But still it doesnt miss the high pitch or loud voice like in cheaper karoke Mics. its better then the cube shape speaker mic for sure. The mic is easy to use and looks good in person.What I dont like: Could have been cheaper.Even after fully charged, The unit I got kept disconnecting itself in Bluetooth mode and reconnecting itself back. This is pretty annoying as the music goes away only voice and echo is heard. And lastly I think at this price the speaker shud be above average.I personally think if u r getting 1 yr warranty from such a product compared to 0 day warranty of a Chinese product. This product is gud enuf. Untill it has disconnecting issues. Ill test other mics and take replacement of this same mic for warranty.
Best Bluetooth speaker

At the time I purchased this product the product page mentioned support upto 32 GB.So I ordered two of these and had to face a consistent problem where whenever I inserted my Sand Disk 32 GB micro SD card, the speaker will start an endless loop of switching between micro SD mode and Bluetooth mode.After testing my new micro SD card multiple times and finding no issue, I by chance tried using a new 16 GB memory card and now it works fine.Overall the speaker is good for the price, however their misleading statement on product page is not appreciated.Because of this issue I had to spend quite some time testing and even had to return one of the two speakers.
It is good for beginners and under the price range
